title: How to Make It Forever Night in Minecraft

steps.title: Get a command block.
steps.content: Get a command block. You can't do this contraption without a command block. Type in the chat the command: /give (Minecraft Username) command_block Example: /give ottergirl24 command_block

steps.title: Get a daylight sensor.
steps.content: Get a daylight sensor. It's easy in creative mode-just simply press E and either search up the daylight sensor or find it in the "Redstone" tab.

steps.title: Get some redstone.
steps.content: Get some redstone. Press "E" and either search up redstone or find it in the "Redstone" tab.

steps.title: Place down the command block and the daylight sensor.
steps.content: Place down the command block and the daylight sensor. You can place them both anywhere, but make it so that they can connect.

steps.title: Right-click the command block.
steps.content: Right-click the command block. Enter this command right here: /time set night .

steps.title: Connect the daylight sensor and the command block together using redstone.
steps.content: Connect the daylight sensor and the command block together using redstone. If you want to place them very far apart, use redstone repeaters to expand the amount of power you can have.

steps.title: Turn it to day and watch it work.
steps.content: Turn it to day and watch it work. Typing the command /time set day will activate the daylight sensor, powering the redstone and activating the command block, using the command /time set night to turn it back to night.

steps.title: Make a new world and turn on cheats.
steps.content: Make a new world and turn on cheats. Command blocks are not craftable and therefore you need to use the command /give (minecraft username) command_block .

steps.title: Craft a daylight sensor.
steps.content: Craft a daylight sensor. You can craft a daylight sensor by going into a crafting table, putting 3 glass blocks on top, 3 nether quartz in the middle, and 3 wooden slabs of any type on the bottom.

steps.title: Find redstone.
steps.content: Find redstone. You might need to dig a lot, but you only need a minimum of one piece, and there is no maximum.

steps.title: Place the command block and daylight sensor a minimum of one block apart.
steps.content: Place the command block and daylight sensor a minimum of one block apart.

steps.title: Right click the command block.
steps.content: Right click the command block. Enter the command: /time set night .

steps.title: Place the redstone in between them and wait until day.
steps.content: Place the redstone in between them and wait until day. It will turn back to night.
